trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows service and allows you to connect to a running or stopped service, manipulate it, or get information about it.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 服务并允许连接到正在运行或者已停止的服务、对其进行操作或获取有关它的信息。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to connect to and control the behavior of existing services.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类来连接到和控制现有服务的行为。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class, you set its properties so it interacts with a specific Windows service.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类，你可以设置其属性，因此它与特定的 Windows 服务进行交互。

trans-unit.source: You can then use the class to start, stop, and otherwise manipulate the service.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用类来启动、 停止和以其他方式操作服务。

trans-unit.source: You will most likely use the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> component in an administrative capacity.
trans-unit.target: 最有可能将使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>组件中的管理容量。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create a Windows or Web application that sends custom commands to a service through the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> instance.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以创建 Windows 或发送自定义的 Web 应用程序的命令为服务通过<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>实例。

trans-unit.source: This would be useful, because the Service Control Manager (SCM) Microsoft Management Console snap-in does not support custom commands.
trans-unit.target: 因为服务控制管理器 (SCM) Microsoft 管理控制台管理单元中不支持自定义命令，这会很有用。

trans-unit.source: After you create an instance of <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>, you must set two properties on it to identify the service with which it interacts: the computer name and the name of the service you want to control.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例后<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>，您必须于该功能来标识它进行交互的服务设置两个属性： 计算机名称和你想要控制服务的名称。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.MachineName%2A> is set to the local computer, so you do not need to change it unless you want to set the instance to point to another computer.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.MachineName%2A>设置为本地计算机，因此不需要更改它，除非你想要设置要指向另一台计算机的实例。

trans-unit.source: Generally, the service author writes code that customizes the action associated with a specific command.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，服务作者编写的自定义与特定命令关联的操作的代码。

trans-unit.source: For example, a service can contain code to respond to an <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase.OnPause%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> command.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一个服务可以包含代码以响应<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase.OnPause%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>命令。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the custom processing for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Pause%2A> task runs before the system pauses the service.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，自定义处理<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Pause%2A>任务运行之前系统可以暂停服务。

trans-unit.source: The set of commands a service can process depends on its properties; for example, you can set the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanStop%2A> property for a service to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 服务可以处理的命令集取决于其属性：例如，你可以设置<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanStop%2A>到服务的属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: This setting renders the `Stop` command unavailable on that particular service; it prevents you from stopping the service from the SCM by disabling the necessary button.
trans-unit.target: 此设置呈现`Stop`命令对该特定服务不可用; 它不允许您通过禁用必要按钮停止 SCM 中的服务。

trans-unit.source: If you try to stop the service from your code, the system raises an error and displays the error message "Failed to stop `servicename`."
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试停止在代码中的服务，系统将引发错误，并显示错误消息"无法停止`servicename`。"

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to control the `SimpleService` service example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了利用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>到控件的类`SimpleService`服务示例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> class that is not associated with a specific service.
trans-unit.target: 初始化与特定服务不关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name that identifies the service to the system.
trans-unit.target: 向系统标识该服务的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can also be the display name for the service.
trans-unit.target: 这也可以是服务的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> class that is associated with an existing service on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化与本地计算机上的现有服务关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor to create a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> object that is used to control a sample service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了利用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数来创建<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>用于控制示例服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 无效。

trans-unit.source: The name that identifies the service to the system.
trans-unit.target: 向系统标识该服务的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can also be the display name for the service.
trans-unit.target: 这也可以是服务的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The computer on which the service resides.
trans-unit.target: 服务所驻留的计算机。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> class that is associated with an existing service on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 初始化与指定计算机上的现有服务关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: For the `machineName` parameter, you can use "." to represent the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 有关`machineName`参数，你可以使用"。"来表示本地计算机。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 无效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="machineName" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the service can be paused and resumed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以暂停和继续服务。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the service can be paused; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务可以暂停，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanPauseAndContinue%2A> property to determine whether a service can pause and continue.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了利用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanPauseAndContinue%2A>属性来确定是否可以暂停和继续服务。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the service should be notified when the system is shutting down.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在系统关闭时是否应通知服务。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the service should be notified when the system is shutting down; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统关闭时应通知服务，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanShutdown%2A> property to determine whether a service provides a handler for a shutdown event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了利用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanShutdown%2A>属性来确定服务是否关闭的事件提供一个处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the service can be stopped after it has started.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示服务在启动后是否可以停止。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the service can be stopped and the <see cref="M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase.OnStop" /> method called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务可以停止并调用了 <see cref="M:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase.OnStop" /> 方法，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanStop%2A> property to determine whether a service provides a handler for a stop event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了利用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.CanStop%2A>属性来确定服务是否提供停止事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: Disconnects this <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> instance from the service and frees all the resources that the instance allocated.
trans-unit.target: 断开此 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 实例与服务的连接，并释放此实例分配的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Close%2A> releases all the handles associated with the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Close%2A> 释放与关联的所有句柄<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>实例。

trans-unit.source: Continues a service after it has been paused.
trans-unit.target: 在服务暂停后继续该服务。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A> for a service, its status is first changed to `ContinuePending` and then, when the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A> method returns, it is changed to `Running`.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A>对于服务，其状态首先更改为`ContinuePending`然后，当<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A>方法返回时，它将更改为`Running`。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A> for the service until the service controller status is `Paused`.
trans-unit.target: 不能调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A>服务的服务控制器状态之前`Paused`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A> method to continue a paused service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了利用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A>方法继续已暂停的服务。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: for controlling services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />

trans-unit.source: for unrestricted access to service information.
trans-unit.target: 用于对服务信息的不受限制访问。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of services that depends on the service associated with this <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取依赖于与此 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 实例关联的服务的服务集。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> instances, each of which is associated with a service that depends on this service.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 实例的数组，其中每个数组均与依赖于此服务的一个服务关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DependentServices%2A> array represents the services that the system stops if your application calls <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A> for this service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DependentServices%2A>数组均表示系统将停止，如果你的应用程序调用的服务<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A>此服务。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to display the set of services that are dependent on the Event Log service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类来显示组的依赖于事件日志服务的服务。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: for connecting to existing services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于连接到计算机上的现有服务。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Browse" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Browse" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a friendly name for the service.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置服务的友好名称。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the service, which can be used to identify the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的友好名称，可用于标识该服务。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DisplayName%2A> to an empty string (""), but setting the property to `null` throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DisplayName%2A>为空字符串 ("")，但将属性设置为`null`引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to display the set of services that are dependent on the Event Log service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类来显示组的依赖于事件日志服务的服务。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DisplayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DisplayName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: An application-defined command flag that indicates which custom command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序定义的命令标志，指示要执行的自定义命令。

trans-unit.source: The value must be between 128 and 256, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 此值必须介于 128 和 256 之间（均含）。

trans-unit.source: Executes a custom command on the service.
trans-unit.target: 对服务执行自定义命令。

trans-unit.source: When you call <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ExecuteCommand%2A>, the status of the service does not change.
trans-unit.target: 当调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ExecuteCommand%2A>，服务的状态不会更改。

trans-unit.source: If the service was started, the status remains `Running`.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务已启动，则状态仍然`Running`。

trans-unit.source: If the service was stopped, the status remains `Stopped`, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务已停止，状态保持`Stopped`，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: To process the custom command, the service must override the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase.OnCustomCommand%2A> method and provide a handler for the command identified by the `command` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要处理的自定义命令，该服务必须重写<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase.OnCustomCommand%2A>方法提供的处理程序标识的命令和`command`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ExecuteCommand%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to execute custom commands in the `SimpleService` service example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了利用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ExecuteCommand%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来执行中的自定义命令`SimpleService`服务示例。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: for controlling services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />

trans-unit.source: for unrestricted access to service information.
trans-unit.target: 用于对服务信息的不受限制访问。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the device driver services on a computer.
trans-unit.target: 检索计算机上的设备驱动程序服务。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the device driver services on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 检索本地计算机上的设备驱动程序服务。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> in which each element is associated with a device driver service on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 类型的数组，其中每个元素均与本地计算机上的一个设备驱动程序服务关联。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices%2A> returns only the device driver services from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices%2A> 从本地计算机将返回仅设备驱动程序服务。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the non-device driver services or services that are not drivers, call the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的非设备驱动程序服务或不是驱动程序的服务，请调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Together, the two methods provide access to all the services on a computer.
trans-unit.target: 在一起，这两种方法提供对所有服务的访问的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to display the device driver services on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类来显示本地计算机上的设备驱动程序服务。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The computer from which to retrieve the device driver services.
trans-unit.target: 要从中检索设备驱动程序服务的计算机。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the device driver services on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定计算机上的设备驱动程序服务。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> in which each element is associated with a device driver service on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 类型的数组，其中每个元素均与指定计算机上的一个设备驱动程序服务关联。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices%2A> returns only the device driver services from the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices%2A> 从指定的计算机返回仅设备驱动程序服务。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the non-device driver services or services that are not drivers, call the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的非设备驱动程序服务或不是驱动程序的服务，请调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Together, the two methods provide access to all the services on a computer.
trans-unit.target: 在一起，这两种方法提供对所有服务的访问的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter has invalid syntax.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 参数的语法无效。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the non-device driver services on a computer, and those that are not drivers.
trans-unit.target: 检索计算机上的非设备驱动程序服务和不是驱动程序的服务。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the services on the local computer, except for the device driver services.
trans-unit.target: 检索本地计算机上的所有服务（设备驱动程序服务除外）。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> in which each element is associated with a service on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 类型的数组，其中每个元素均与本地计算机上的一个服务关联。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A> returns only the non-device driver services and the services that are not drivers from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A> 返回仅的非设备驱动程序服务和不是来自本地计算机的驱动程序的服务。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve device driver services, call the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索设备驱动程序服务，请调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Together, the two methods provide access to all the services on a computer.
trans-unit.target: 在一起，这两种方法提供对所有服务的访问的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to display the services that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类来显示在本地计算机运行的服务。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The computer from which to retrieve the services.
trans-unit.target: 要从中检索服务的计算机。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves all the services on the specified computer, except for the device driver services.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定计算机上的所有服务（设备驱动程序服务除外）。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> in which each element is associated with a service on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 类型的数组，其中每个元素均与指定计算机上的一个服务关联。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A> returns only the non-device driver services and the services that are not drivers from the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetServices%2A> 返回仅的非设备驱动程序服务和不是从指定的计算机的驱动程序的服务。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve device driver services, call the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索设备驱动程序服务，请调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.GetDevices%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Together, the two methods provide access to all the services on a computer.
trans-unit.target: 在一起，这两种方法提供对所有服务的访问的计算机上。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="machineName" /> parameter has invalid syntax.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="machineName" /> 参数的语法无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the computer on which this service resides.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此服务所驻留的计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer that is running the service associated with this <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 正在运行与此 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 实例关联的服务的计算机名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer (".").
trans-unit.target: 默认为本地计算机 (".")。

trans-unit.source: The computer name is the name of the server that is running this service, without the preceding backslash characters (\\\\).
trans-unit.target: 计算机名称是运行此服务，而无需前面的反斜杠字符的服务器的名称 (\\\\)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.MachineName" /> syntax is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.MachineName" /> 语法无效。

trans-unit.source: Suspends a service's operation.
trans-unit.target: 挂起服务的操作。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A> for the service until the service controller status is `Paused`.
trans-unit.target: 不能调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Continue%2A>服务的服务控制器状态之前`Paused`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Pause%2A> method to pause a service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了利用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Pause%2A>方法来暂停服务。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: for controlling services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />

trans-unit.source: for unrestricted access to service information.
trans-unit.target: 用于对服务信息的不受限制访问。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Refreshes property values by resetting the properties to their current values.
trans-unit.target: 通过将属性重置为其当前值来刷新属性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Refresh%2A> method causes the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServicesDependedOn%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DependentServices%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Status%2A> properties to be reset to their current values when they are next referenced.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Refresh%2A>方法使<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServicesDependedOn%2A>， <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DependentServices%2A>，和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Status%2A>属性被重置为其当前值在下一步引用时。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Refresh%2A> method to obtain the status of a service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了利用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Refresh%2A>方法来获取服务的状态。

trans-unit.source: The code instructs a service to pause, and then waits for the status to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 该代码指示到暂停，然后等待的状态以反映此更改的服务。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle for the service.
trans-unit.target: 获取服务的句柄。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle" /> that contains the handle for the service.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle" />，包含服务的句柄。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于访问非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that identifies the service that this instance references.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对此实例引用的服务进行标识的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name that identifies the service that this <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> instance references.
trans-unit.target: 对此 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 实例引用的服务进行标识的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName%2A> identifies the service to the Service Control Manager.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName%2A>标识的服务到服务控制管理器。

trans-unit.source: Changing this property causes the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> instance to bind to another service, it does not change what the Service Control Manager's Microsoft Management Console snap-in displays.
trans-unit.target: 更改此属性会导致<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>实例绑定到另一个服务，它不会更改哪些服务控制管理器的 Microsoft 管理控制台管理单元中显示。

trans-unit.source: When you are implementing a custom service, the value of this property must be identical to the name recorded for the service in the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.ServiceName%2A> property of the corresponding <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller> class.
trans-unit.target: 在实现自定义服务时，此属性的值必须与记录中的服务的名称相同<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller.ServiceName%2A>的相应属性<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>类。

trans-unit.source: In code, the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName%2A> is usually set in the `main()` function of the executable.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName%2A>通常在中设置`main()`函数的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: When you reset the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName%2A> property, the method that sets the property sets this instance's <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DisplayName%2A> to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 重置时<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName%2A>属性时，设置的属性的方法设置此实例的<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DisplayName%2A>为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the <see cref="P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName" /> property is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceName" /> 属性的语法无效。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: The set of services that this service depends on.
trans-unit.target: 此服务所依赖的服务集。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> instances, each of which is associated with a service that must be running for this service to run.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 实例的数组，其中每个实例均与使此服务运行所必须运行的某个服务关联。

trans-unit.source: If any service in the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServicesDependedOn%2A> array is not running, you will not be able to start this service.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何服务中<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServicesDependedOn%2A>数组未运行，你将无法启动此服务。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to display the set of services that the Messenger service is dependent on.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类来显示的 Messenger 服务所依赖的服务集。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: for connecting to existing services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于连接到计算机上的现有服务。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Browse" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Browse" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of service that this object references.
trans-unit.target: 获取此对象引用的服务类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType" /> values, used to indicate the network service type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceType" /> 值之一，用于指示网络服务类型。

trans-unit.source: The service type indicates how the service is used by the system.
trans-unit.target: 服务类型指示系统如何使用服务。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceType%2A> property represents a set of flags combined using the bitwise OR operator.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServiceType%2A>属性表示一组使用按位 OR 运算符组合的标志。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to display the device driver services on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类来显示本地计算机上的设备驱动程序服务。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: Starts the service.
trans-unit.target: 启动服务。

trans-unit.source: Starts the service, passing no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 启动服务，不传递任何自变量。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A> for the service until the service controller status is `Running`.
trans-unit.target: 不能调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A>服务的服务控制器状态之前`Running`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to check whether the Alerter service is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类，以检查是否停止警报服务。

trans-unit.source: If the service is stopped, the example starts the service and waits until the service status is set to <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.Running>.
trans-unit.target: 如果该服务已停止，此示例启动服务，并等待，直到服务状态设置为<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.Running>。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: for controlling services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />

trans-unit.source: for unrestricted access to service information.
trans-unit.target: 用于对服务信息的不受限制访问。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: An array of arguments to pass to the service when it starts.
trans-unit.target: 在服务启动时传递给它的自变量数组。

trans-unit.source: Starts a service, passing the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 启动服务，传递指定的自变量。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A> for the service until the service controller status is `Running`.
trans-unit.target: 不能调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A>服务的服务控制器状态之前`Running`。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service cannot be started.
trans-unit.target: 服务无法启动。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="args" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="args" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A member of the array is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该数组的一个成员是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for controlling services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />

trans-unit.source: for unrestricted access to service information.
trans-unit.target: 用于对服务信息的不受限制访问。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates how the service represented by the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> object starts.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController" /> 对象表示的服务是如何启动的。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates how the service starts.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示该服务的启动方式。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: for browsing services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 浏览计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Browse" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Browse" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the status of the service that is referenced by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取由此实例引用的服务的状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus" /> values that indicates whether the service is running, stopped, or paused, or whether a start, stop, pause, or continue command is pending.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus" /> 值之一，指示服务是正在运行、已停止还是已暂停，或者启动、停止、暂停或继续命令被挂起。

trans-unit.source: The status indicates the current state of the service.
trans-unit.target: 状态指示服务的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The set of possible values includes several that indicate whether a state-changing command is pending.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值集包括的多个指示状态更改命令是否处于挂起状态。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to check the current status of the Telnet service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类来检查 Telnet 服务的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: If the service is stopped, the example starts the service.
trans-unit.target: 如果该服务已停止，该示例将启动此服务。

trans-unit.source: If the service is running, the example stops the service.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务正在运行，此示例将停止该服务。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: Stops this service and any services that are dependent on this service.
trans-unit.target: 停止该服务以及任何依赖于该服务的服务。

trans-unit.source: If any services depend on this service for their operation, they will be stopped before this service is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何服务依赖于其操作此服务，它们将被停止之前已停止此服务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DependentServices%2A> property contains the set of services that depend on this one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.DependentServices%2A>属性包含的服务依赖于此集。

trans-unit.source: If you stop a service that this service depends on, call the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A> method on this service within the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A> method of the parent service.
trans-unit.target: 如果停止此服务依赖于服务时，调用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A>对此服务中的方法<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.Stop%2A>父服务的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServicesDependedOn%2A> property contains the services that this service depends on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.ServicesDependedOn%2A>属性包含此服务所依赖的服务。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to check the current status of the Telnet service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类来检查 Telnet 服务的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: If the service is stopped, the example starts the service.
trans-unit.target: 如果该服务已停止，该示例将启动此服务。

trans-unit.source: If the service is running, the example stops the service.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务正在运行，此示例将停止该服务。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing a system API.
trans-unit.target: 访问 API 时出错。

trans-unit.source: The service was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到服务。

trans-unit.source: for controlling services on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 用于控制计算机上的服务。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerPermissionAccess.Control" />

trans-unit.source: for unrestricted access to service information.
trans-unit.target: 用于对服务信息的不受限制访问。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Waits for the service to reach the specified status.
trans-unit.target: 等待服务达到指定状态。

trans-unit.source: The status to wait for.
trans-unit.target: 要等待的状态。

trans-unit.source: Infinitely waits for the service to reach the specified status.
trans-unit.target: 无休止的等待服务达到指定状态。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> to suspend an application's processing until the service has reached the required status.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A>挂起应用程序的处理，直到该服务已达到所需的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> method waits approximately 250 milliseconds between each status check.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A>方法等待约 250 毫秒之间每个状态检查。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> cannot detect the case of the observed service changing to the `desiredStatus` and then immediately to another status in that interval.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> 无法检测到更改为观察到服务的事例`desiredStatus`，然后立即到另一个状态在此间隔期间。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController> class to check whether the Alerter service is stopped.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController>类，以检查是否停止警报服务。

trans-unit.source: If the service is stopped, the example starts the service and waits until the service status is set to <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.Running>.
trans-unit.target: 如果该服务已停止，此示例启动服务，并等待，直到服务状态设置为<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus.Running>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="desiredStatus" /> parameter is not any of the values defined in the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="desiredStatus" /> 参数不是 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus" /> 枚举中定义的任意值。

trans-unit.source: The status to wait for.
trans-unit.target: 要等待的状态。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object specifying the amount of time to wait for the service to reach the specified status.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 对象，指定服务在到达指定状态前需要等待的时间量。

trans-unit.source: Waits for the service to reach the specified status or for the specified time-out to expire.
trans-unit.target: 等待服务达到指定状态或等待指定的超时过期。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> to suspend an application's processing until the service has reached the required status.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A>挂起应用程序的处理，直到该服务已达到所需的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> method waits approximately 250 milliseconds between each status check.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A>方法等待约 250 毫秒之间每个状态检查。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> cannot detect the case of the observed service changing to the `desiredStatus` and then immediately to another status in that interval.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceController.WaitForStatus%2A> 无法检测到更改为观察到服务的事例`desiredStatus`，然后立即到另一个状态在此间隔期间。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="desiredStatus" /> parameter is not any of the values defined in the <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="desiredStatus" /> 参数不是 <see cref="T:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus" /> 枚举中定义的任意值。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for the <paramref name="timeout" /> parameter expires.
trans-unit.target: 为 <paramref name="timeout" /> 参数指定的值过期。
